title: Casino visitors in the U.S. ordered by age group 2010
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Age of casino visitors, and a y axis representing Percentage of respondents.
The highest category is found at Age_50-64 where Percentage of respondents is 33.0.
The lowest category is found at Don't_know_/_refused where Percentage of respondents is 3.0.
